name: TF3 2D
description: 2d platformer and shooter, with strong influences from Titanfall and My friend Pedro set in a cyberpunk style city. To progress, you must master your advanced parkour skills (including a grapple hook) in conjunction with an arsenal of 8 different weapons to take on your enemies before reaching the final boss, BOZO.  Solo developed and might not update but wanted  to share the main concept. I can beat the game in about 7 minutes but normally it will take ~45 mins because it has a purposely high skill ceiling but only 5 levels, including one boss and tutorial. If you like it let me know and I might continue with the project, all feedback welcome.
